android.webkit.gears
Class AndroidWifiDataProvider

java.lang.Object
  android.content.BroadcastReceiver
      android.webkit.gears.AndroidWifiDataProvider

public final class AndroidWifiDataProvider
extends BroadcastReceiver

WiFi data provider implementation for Android.

Constructor Summary
AndroidWifiDataProvider(WebView webview, long object)
          Constructs a instance of this class and registers for wifi scan updates.
 
Method Summary

          This method is called when the AndroidWifiDataProvider is receiving an Intent broadcast.
 void shutdown()
          Called when the provider is no longer needed.

Constructor Detail

AndroidWifiDataProvider

public AndroidWifiDataProvider(WebView webview,
                               long object)
Constructs a instance of this class and registers for wifi scan updates. Note that this constructor must be called on a Looper thread. Suitable threads can be created on the native side using the AndroidLooperThread C++ class.

Method Detail

shutdown

public void shutdown()
Called when the provider is no longer needed.

                      Intent intent)
This method is called when the AndroidWifiDataProvider is receiving an Intent broadcast.

Specified by:
onReceive in class BroadcastReceiver
Parameters:
context - The Context in which the receiver is running.
intent - The Intent being received.
